TEXT: A master of arcane arts from the Dota universe. NL Combines different elements to cast powerful spells.
NL You summon your most powerful spells...

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~master~ ~of~ ~elements,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
